title: My Personal Website
content: I build this website to showcase my cv and what else I learned.

title: Go Course
subtitle: Go Basic Course by Stephen Grider
content: I learned the basics of go.

title: Microservice Architecture with C#
subtitle: I build a Microsverice Applickation using C#
content: In this course  by Neil Cummings, I build an auction house application using a microservice architecture in C#

title: Microservices with Node JS and React
content: This course by Stephen Grider was my introduction to microservices. I build a e-commerce platform to purchase tickets.

title: Stephen Grider - Modern React with Redux
content:
Course by Stephen Grider. This course covered React and Redux Toolkit it included RTK Query, Routing, Immer, tons of custom hooks, and more!

  • Create dynamic web apps using the latest in web technology
  • Practice your skills with many large projects, exercises, and quizzes
  • Master the fundamentals concepts behind React and Redux
  • Become fluent in the toolchain supporting React, including NPM, Webpack, Babel, and ES6/ES2015 Javascript syntax

title: Tim Corey - Web Development Mastercourse
content: This large course covered the very basics of how the web works: DNS, SSL, CDNs, IP Addresses, Web Servers and then introduced the main players: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Tim Corey - Docker
content: This course was a comprehensive introduction into Docker. Covering, how to build a dockerfile, how to use the command line, how to use Docker with ASP.NET Core, and more.

title: Tim Corey - Azure from Start to Finish
content: Introduction to azure, the azure portal, and 14 important services. Those services include: Azure Web Apps, Azure SQL, CosmosDB, SignalR, Key Vault, Azure Storage, Azure Functions, Azure Service Bus

title: Tim Corey C# Mastercourse
content: Extensive course by Tim Corey on the basics of modern C# Development.'
